cast.name: 贝辛妮·弗兰凯 Bethenny Frankel

this_title: The Real Housewives of New York City Season 5
introduction: Sonja kicks things off with a party to mingle with Aviva, Carole and Heather. They all seem to hit it off... until Ramona arrives. Heather and Carole try to figure out who to trust and not. Picking up right where they left off, LuAnn is still annoyed with Ramona about the disparaging comments she made about LuAnn's parenting and tries to discuss it with her at the party.
foreign_title: The Real Housewives of New York City Season 5
